common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Invalid access_token.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid partner_id.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: No permission to current api.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_sign
error_list.description: Wrong sign.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: no timestamp

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid timestamp

error_list.name: error_network
error_list.description: Inner http call failed

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: parse data failed

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: data not exist

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: parameter invalid

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Something wrong. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_shop
error_list.description: shopid is invalid

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: request not from gateway

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_min_price_error
error_list.description: Min_basket_price must be higher than the fix amount if Min_basket_price is not 0.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_btoc_item_blocked_error
error_list.description: Some items cannot be uploaded as they are b2c products in FBS shop

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_code_duplicate_error
error_list.description: Duplicated voucher code.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_code_error
error_list.description: Voucher code doesn't meet the requirement. Only support 0-9 or A-Z or a-z. Up to 5 characters.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_coin_error
error_list.description: Cannot create coin cashback voucher.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_display_channel_error
error_list.description: Voucher display channel is set wrongly.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_end_time_error
error_list.description: Voucher valid period can not be longer than 3 months.

error_list.name: voucher.fix_amount_low_qualtiy_errorr
error_list.description: Voucher cannot be saved as it is lower than {limit}%. Please adjust the percentage amount to be more than or equal to {limit}%.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_item_blocked_from_promotion_error
error_list.description: Some items cannot be uploaded as they are prohibited from promotions due to regulations

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_item_duplication_error
error_list.description: Duplicated items in item_id_list.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_item_count_limit_error
error_list.description: The number of items in item_id_list exceeds the limit.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_item_not_exist
error_list.description: Some item in item_id_list doesn't exist

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_item_status_error
error_list.description: Not all the items in item_id_list are in normal status.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_item_stock_error
error_list.description: Some item in item_id_list has 0 stock.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_max_discount_low_quality
error_list.description: To attract buyers to use your voucher, please increase maximum discount price to > {percentage_input*min_spend*0.01} or reduce minimum basket price to < {max_discount*100/percentage_input} to ensure buyers can enjoy the percentage discount configured.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_over_limit
error_list.description: The total number of ongoing voucher and upcoming voucher cannot exceed 1000.

error_list.name: voucher.percentage_low_quality_error
error_list.description: Voucher cannot be saved as it is lower than {limit}.00%. Please adjust the percentage amount to be more than or equal to {limit}.00%.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_start_time_error
error_list.description: Voucher start time is earlier than current time.

error_list.name: voucher.voucher_time_period_error
error_list.description: Voucher end time must be 1 hour later than the start time.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"voucher_name","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"testamount","type":"string","description":"The name of the voucher.","key":"ksCHxP"},{"name":"voucher_code","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"test","type":"string","description":"The code of the voucher.","key":"cwSDtfK"},{"name":"start_time","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"1624719600","type":"timestamp","description":"

The timing from when the voucher is valid; so buyer is allowed to claim and to use. Field can only be updated if voucher has not started.

","key":"pFnAEKZ"},{"name":"end_time","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"1624978800","type":"timestamp","description":"The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use. ","key":"wfmhPb"},{"name":"voucher_type","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"1","type":"int32","description":"The type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: shop voucher, 2: product voucher.","key":"DbrFrRd"},{"name":"reward_type","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"1","type":"int32","description":"The reward type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: fix_amount voucher, 2: discount_percentage voucher, 3: coin_cashback voucher.","key":"HTSKMSp"},{"name":"usage_quantity","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"20000","type":"int32","description":"The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.","key":"MsNsmi"},{"name":"min_basket_price","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"12.01","type":"float","description":"The minimum spend required for using this voucher. ","key":"WdwwzG"},{"name":"discount_amount","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"1.55","type":"float","description":"The discount amount set for this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a fix amount voucher.","key":"PeeisZD"},{"name":"percentage","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"22","type":"int32","description":"The discount percentage set for this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher.","key":"MKBFPMc"},{"name":"max_price","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"12.0","type":"float","description":"

The max amount of discount/value a user can enjoy by using this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher.If no cap limit, can set to be 0.

","key":"YprhPNN"},{"name":"display_channel_list","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"[1]","type":"int32[]","description":"

The FE channel where the voucher will be displayed. The available values are: 1: display_all  3: feed, 4: live streaming, [] (empty - which is hidden).

","key":"ZikGmXX"},{"name":"item_id_list","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"[1223223,1223213]","type":"int64[]","description":"The list of items which is applicable for the voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a product type of voucher.","key":"JfCDHkB"},{"name":"display_start_time","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"162078900","type":"int32","description":"

The timing of when voucher is displayed on shop pages; so buyer is allowed to claim.display_start_time must be left empty if the display_channel_list is empty (when voucher is hidden), otherwise it will show error.

","key":"dMHXAs"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"error","description":"Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"DQmZGHe"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"message","description":"Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"ifDreyy"},{"sample":"4e5d881ac1bc11ebba0dacde48001122","type":"string","name":"request_id","description":"The identifier of the API request for error tracking.","key":"jMZyyBW"},{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"Detailed informations you are querying.","name":"response","children":[{"sample":"123","type":"int64","name":"voucher_id","description":"The unique identifier for the created voucher.","key":"PpFHTEb"}],"key":"EniGTJZ"}]}

update_log_list.content: Optimize the display_start_time of request parameters description
Optimize the Sample information of Request Parameter and Response Parameter
Request Parameter add new field display_start_time
